about_the_game:
"Furry Killer" presents an exhilarating and action-packed arena shooter experience that immerses players in a relentless battle against hordes of malevolent furry creatures. In this heart-pounding game, you assume the role of a formidable protagonist tasked with combating wave after wave of these fiendish foes.


Game Features
  • Intense Arena Battles: Engage in heart-pounding battles against relentless waves of evil furry creatures, testing your reflexes and combat skills in dynamic arena environments.
  • Coin-Driven Progression: Defeat foes strategically to collect coins that serve as currency for upgrading your arsenal of weapons, allowing you to tailor your firepower to your preferred playstyle.
  • Weapon Variety: Choose from a diverse selection of powerful and unique weapons, each with its own abilities and strengths, providing endless tactical possibilities for dealing with different enemy types.
  • Endless Mode Challenge: Push your limits in the endless mode, where waves of furry creatures become increasingly challenging, offering a true test of skill, endurance, and strategic thinking.
  • Immersive Visuals and Sound: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning and captivating world, enhanced by detailed arena designs and immersive sound effects that bring the intense battles and creatures to life.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features gross escalation, bloody manifestations, and brutality (including decapitation or dismemberment).

"Furry Killer" presents an exhilarating and action-packed arena shooter experience that immerses players in a relentless battle against hordes of malevolent furry creatures. In this heart-pounding game, you assume the role of a formidable protagonist tasked with combating wave after wave of these fiendish foes.


Game Features
  • Intense Arena Battles: Engage in heart-pounding battles against relentless waves of evil furry creatures, testing your reflexes and combat skills in dynamic arena environments.
  • Coin-Driven Progression: Defeat foes strategically to collect coins that serve as currency for upgrading your arsenal of weapons, allowing you to tailor your firepower to your preferred playstyle.
  • Weapon Variety: Choose from a diverse selection of powerful and unique weapons, each with its own abilities and strengths, providing endless tactical possibilities for dealing with different enemy types.
  • Endless Mode Challenge: Push your limits in the endless mode, where waves of furry creatures become increasingly challenging, offering a true test of skill, endurance, and strategic thinking.
  • Immersive Visuals and Sound: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning and captivating world, enhanced by detailed arena designs and immersive sound effects that bring the intense battles and creatures to life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2

name: Furry Killer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030

short_description: "Furry Killer" is a fast-paced arena shooter where you fight against waves of evil furry creatures. Defeat them, collect coins, and upgrade your weapons to survive in an endless mode.
